original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 10.12. Sanidassanattika, Hetudukādi
analyzed: sani dassana ttika hetu duka ādi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu dhammo
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigha

original: nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu
analyzed: na hetum dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassa na sappaṭighaḥ na hetu ca na a nidassa na appaṭighaḥ na hetu

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: naanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na hetu ca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti

original: hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: nahetu ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetu ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu dhammo
analyzed: na a nidassana sa paṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na a nidassana sa paṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na anidassana sappaṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na anidassana sappaṭigha

original: nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu
analyzed: na hetum dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassa na sappaṭighaḥ na hetu ca na a nidassa na appaṭighaḥ na hetu

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā na anidassana sappaṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: naanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na hetu ca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti

original: hetupaccayā. Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: hetu paccayā na anidassana appaṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nahetu ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetu ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: na anidassana appaṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuñca naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na hetuñca na anidassana appaṭigham na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuñca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na hetuñca na anidassana sappaṭigham na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa sabbattha vitthāro

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham nana hetum dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ nana hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sabbattha nava

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sa paṭigham na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca sabbattha nava

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na hetu vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na hetum ca iva na ahetukam ca dhammam paṭicca pe na sa nidassana sa paṭigha

original: naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuñceva
analyzed: na ahetukam ca iva na na hetum ca dhammam paṭicca pe na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na hetum ca iva

original: nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetu vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuvippayuttañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na hetu vippayuttam ca iva na na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na hetum na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na hetum na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca sabbattha nava
